I 'feel' your pain, though I haven't experienced any of the console versions myself.
Yeah its a great game,but I think the attitude of the team to this version of game can be better...

11 hours ago, Albert950417 said:

Yeah its a great game,but I think the attitude of the team to this version of game can be better...

 

The port to console was done by a 'sub contractor' with the relevant skills and experience.  So I believe that the Squad teams role is not as 'hands on' as it is for PC.

Also there are additional 'licensing/certification' hoops to jump through for the console versions that are imposed by the console makers.

When Squad originally announced a console port many on here raised concerns, many of which appear to have been valid unfortunately.

I do think the KSP2 port will be much better as it is planned from the outset, rather than added as an afterthought, like a great many of KSP1's features are.
